description: Worrywart Conner Habib is running off at the mouth again, fretting about the prospect of being laid off. Gagging continuously on 2 slabs of monster meat, moaning with Girth's cock pumped up his hole, then having Colby sitting on his face, Conner is transported to hog heaven, forgetting his troubles for awhile. Then lined up with Girth screwing Colby who's boning Conner, the three excited employees -- linked together by big cocks and office drama -- work out their petty differences and end up with three milky blasts of spooge.
title: Laid-Off
